mutants.code:
import re

def remove_comments(code: str) -> str:
    code = re.sub('', '', code)
    code = re.sub('/\\*.*?\\*/', '', code, flags=re.DOTALL)
    return code

import re

def remove_comments(code: str) -> str:
    code = re.sub('//.*\\n', 'MUTATED', code)
    code = re.sub('/\\*.*?\\*/', '', code, flags=re.DOTALL)
    return code

    code = re.sub('', '', code, flags=re.DOTALL)
    return code
